name: ELECTRIC POWER SUPPLY ASSOCIATION (EPSA)
description: EPSA is the national trade association representing Americas competitive power suppliers
sampleDescriptions: Will advocate on issues involving federal energy policy, clean energy, energy storage, energy infrastructure, and environmental issues generally.
American Energy Innovation Act, Nuclear Energy Leadership Act, Energy Innovation and Standards Act, and the Clean Economy Jobs and Innovation Act
H.R. 133, Consolidated Appropriations Act (omnibus appropriations, COVID-19 stimulus, energy bill provisions).
American Energy Innovation Act, Nuclear Energy Leadership Act, Energy Innovation and Standards Act, and the Clean Economy Jobs and Innovation Act.

Clean Future Act. 
Energy issues, weather-related energy issues, and competitive market issues generally
